verses.text: PEA fanongo ‘e he ngaahi fili ‘o Siuta mo Penisimani, tokua ‘oku fai ‘e he ha‘a pōpula ‘enau langa temipale mo‘o Sihova ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli;

ko ia na‘a nau fe‘unu‘i mai kia Seluipepeli, pea ki he hou‘eiki ‘ulumotu‘a, ‘o nau pehē kiate kinautolu, Tau fai fakataha mo kimoutolu ‘a e langa ‘o e fale: he ‘oku mau feinga‘i homou ‘Otua hangē ko kimoutolu; pea kuo mau feilaulau ki ai talu ‘a e kuonga ‘o ‘Esa-‘ātoni ko e Tu‘i ‘Āsilia, ‘a ia na‘a ne ‘omi kimautolu ki heni.

Pea tali ki ai ‘e Seluipepeli, mo Sisua, mo e hou‘eiki ‘ulumotu‘a kātoa ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘Oku ‘ikai hamou kaunga ‘i he langa fale mo‘omau ‘Otua; ka ko kimautolu pē te mau langa fale mo‘o Sihova, ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘o hangē ko homau tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Kingi Kōlesi ko e Tu‘i Pēsia.
Ko ia ko e kakai ‘o e fonua na‘a nau fakavaivai tu‘u ‘a e nima ‘o e kakai Siuta, mo fakahoha‘asi kinautolu ‘i he langa fale;
pea nau nō ha ni‘ihi ‘i he kau fale‘i ke fakapinepine ki he‘enau me‘a, ‘i he kotoa ‘o e taimi ‘o Kōlesi Tu‘i Pēsia, ‘o a‘u atu ki he pule ‘a Talaiasi Tu‘i Pēsia.
Pea ‘i he pule ‘a Sease, ‘io, ‘i he kamata ‘ene pule, na‘a nau fai ‘a e tohi talatalaaki ‘o e nofo Siuta mo Selusalema.

Pea ‘i he kuonga ‘o ‘Atasease na‘e fai tohi ‘e Pisilami, Mitelatata, Tape‘eli, mo honau fa‘ahi kātoa kia ‘Atasease Tu‘i Pēsia; pea na‘e fai ‘a e tohi ‘i he mata‘itohi faka-‘Ālamea, pea ‘i he lea faka-‘Ālamea.
Ko Lēhumi ko e fakafofonga ‘o e tu‘i mo Simisai ko e sēkelitali, na‘a na fai ‘a e tohi talatalaaki ‘o Selusalema kia Kingi ‘Atasease, ‘o pehē,

“Na‘e toki tohi ‘e Lēhumi ko e fakafofonga ‘o e tu‘i, mo Simisai ko e sēkelitali, mo honau fa‘ahi kotoa–ko e kau Tina, mo e kau ‘Afasataka, ‘a e kau Tāpela, ‘a e kau ‘Apesia, ‘a e kau ‘Ēleki, ‘a e kau Pāpilone, ‘a e kau Susa, ‘a e kau Tehavi, ‘a e kau ‘Īlami,
mo hono toe ‘o e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ‘a ia na‘e ‘omi ‘e he ‘eiki mā‘olunga mo mamalu ko ‘Asinapa, ‘o tuku ‘i he kolo ko Samēlia, mo e fonua ‘i Tu‘a-vaitafe, ‘esetelā.”
Ko eni ‘a e hiki ‘o e tohi na‘a nau fai kia Kingi ‘Atasease; “Tū ko kimautolu ko ho‘o kau tamaio‘eiki ko e tu‘unga me‘a ‘i Tu‘a-vaitafe, ‘esetelā.

“Ke mea‘i ‘e he ‘Afiona ko e kau Siu na‘e ha‘u meiate koe kuo nau a‘u kiate kimautolu ki Selusalema; ‘oku nau lolotonga langa ‘a e kolo angatu‘u mo pau‘u ko ia, pea kuo nau faka‘osi hono ‘ā, pea kuo nau ngaohi ‘a e ngaahi tu‘unga.

Pea ko ‘eni, ke mea‘i ‘e he ‘Afiona, kapau ‘e langa ‘a e kolo ni, mo faka‘osi hono ‘ā, ‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘atu tukuhau, pe ko e tute, pe ko e totongi ‘o e hala, pea ‘e iku pē ki he fakasi‘isi‘i ‘o e me‘a ‘a e tu‘i.
Pea ko ‘eni, ko e me‘a ‘i he‘emau kai ‘a e māsima ‘o e Palasi, ‘oku ‘ikai taau mo kimautolu ke sio ki ha me‘a ‘e kovi ai ‘a e tu‘i; ‘a ē ā kuo mau fekau atu ai ke fakahā ki he ‘Afiona;

koe‘uhi ke fai ha kumi ‘i he tohi kalonikali ‘a ho‘o ngaahi kui: pea te ke toki ma‘u ‘i he tohi kalonikali, ‘o mea‘i ko e kolo ko ē ko e kolo angatu‘u, pea kuo kai me‘a kovi ai ‘a e ngaahi tu‘i mo e ngaahi pule‘anga, pea kuo fai angatu‘u ‘i ai talu mei mu‘a ‘i mu‘a: ‘a ē ā na‘e fakaka‘anga ai ‘a e kolo.
‘Oku mau fakapapau atu ki he ‘Afiona, kapau ‘e langa ‘a e kolo ko ē, mo faka‘osi hono ‘ā, ‘e iku ai ki he ‘ikai ha‘o kei kaunga ki Tu‘a-vaitafe ni.”

Toki fai ‘e he tu‘i ha tali kia Lēhumi ko e fakafofonga ‘o e tu‘i, mo Simisai ko e sēkelitali, mo honau fa‘ahi kotoa ‘oku nofo ‘i Samēlia, pea ‘i hono toe ‘o e fonua ‘i Tu‘a-vaitafe: “Si‘oto‘ofa atu, ‘esetelā.
“Ko e tohi na‘a mou fai kiate kimautolu na‘e lau ‘i hoku ‘ao ke mahino.
Pea u fai tu‘utu‘uni, pea kuo kumi, pea kuo ‘ilo kuo tu‘u ‘a e kolo ko ē ki he ngaahi tu‘i talu mei mu‘a ‘i mu‘a; pea kuo fai ai ‘a e pau‘u mo e angatu‘u.
Pea kuo ai foki hani tu‘i kaukaua ‘i Selusalema, pea kuo nau pule ki Tu‘a-vaitafe na kotoa, pea kuo ‘ange kiate kinautolu ‘a e tukuhau, mo e tute, mo e totongi hala.
Pea ko eni, mou fai ha tu‘utu‘uni ke ta‘ofi ‘a e kau tangata na, pea ke ‘oua na‘a langa ‘a e kolo ko ena; kae‘oua ke u fai ha tu‘utu‘uni pehē.
Pea tokanga ke ‘oua te mou faifaimālie ‘i he me‘a ko ia: koe‘uma‘ā ke tupu ai ha me‘a ke kovi ai ‘a e tu‘i?”

Pea ‘i he lau leva ‘a e hiki ‘o e tohi ‘a Kingi ‘Atasease ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Lēhumi, mo e sēkelitali ko Simisai, mo honau fa‘ahi, na‘a nau ‘alu fakavave ki Selusalema ki he kau Siu, ‘o nau ta‘ofi fakamālohi ‘aki ‘a e tau.
Toki tuku ‘a e ngāue ki he fale ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘i Selusalema; pea talu ai pē, ‘o a‘u ki hono ua ‘o e ta‘u ‘o e pule ‘a Talaiasi ko e Tu‘i Pēsia.
